reviews.comments: Excelente departamento. Muy cómodo y agradable. Todo lo necesario para pasar una grata estadía.  Y muy amable y atenta Mariana. Sumamente recomendable. Muchas gracias por todo. Saludos

Disfrute mucho la estadía en lo de Mariana. Ella estuvo para recibirnos y explicarnos todo acerca del departamento. El lugar estaba en perfectas condiciones, igual a la foto que aparece en la publicación, todo limpio y ordenado. Mariana tiene un trato amable y se mostró dispuesta a ayudarnos en todo, incluso nos mantuvimos en contacto mediante mensajes haciendo todo mucho mas cómodo. La recomiendo ampliamente como anfitriona y recomiendo el lugar para cualquiera que busque pasar una buena estadía en Mar del Plata.

El departamento está impecable y completísimo. Limpieza perfecta y no encontramos nada que pueda faltar... Nosotros éramos cuatro y estuvimos muy comodos (si bien es un solo ambiente, es muy grande). La terraza soñada. Todo andaba perfecto (WiFi, tele, equipo de música, equipos de cocina, la NetSpresso!). La ubicación muy buena, bastante cerca de todo. Muy recomendable y sin dudas volveríamos!!
Lindo departamento, excelente atención de Mariana y Roberto! Volveremos

El departamento es tal cual las fotos. Muy lindo y con decoraciones modernas. Muy recomendable volvería de vuelta! Anfitrión muy puntual y predispuesto a cualquier explicación. El
Edificio bastante tranquilo. Lo recomiendo

Fue un fin de semana muy agradable en Mar del Plata! El lugar es muy lindo y una terraza increíble. Mariana & Roberto, nos recibieron muy bien y nos pasaron varios Tips de la Ciudad para poder disfrutar de la misma.
Muy bueno el alojamiento y muy buenos anfitriones, son recomendables!
reviews.response:
Gracias Guillermo por tu comentario :) Nos encanta recibir huéspedes como Ustedes !
Los esperamos

reviews.comments:
El lugar es tal cual se ve en las fotos (algo no tan común en airbnb). El lugar es muy cómodo y nos lo entregaron impecable.
Doris fue muy amable en el check in y check out.
La terraza es muy espaciosa y esta buenísima para desayunar o tomar algo a la noche.
En resumen, el lugar está espectacular y la atención tambien fue increíble.
Muy muy recomendable!!!
reviews.response:
Juan gracias por tu comentario .
Es muy importante para nosotros que se sientan como en Casa... o lo intentamos :)
Los esperamos en Mardel

reviews.comments: El departamento es muy lindo tal cual se ve en la foto. Tiene una terraza increible. Mariana y Roberto nos recibieron muy bien y nos atendieron muy bien. 100% recomendable!
Todo muy bien como siempre! Excelente departamento, con una increíble atención de parte de Mariana y Roberto. Nos veremos la próxima!
Todo perfecto. Muy lindo el depto y muy amables sus dueños. Lo recomiendo.

Excelentes anfitriones Mariana y Roberto, hemos pasado unos días increíbles. El departamento impecable y Mariana y Roberto estuvieron atentos para asegurarse que estábamos bien durante la estadía. Altamente recomendable. Excelente ubicación también. Seguramente repetiremos esta experiencia en otra oportunidad. Todo 10 puntos

Hermoso departamento con una terracita muy agradable y útil. Ideal para disfrutar del desayuno o de un atardecer al aire libre. Anfitriones muy cordiales y atentos en el trato. Las fotografías reflejan tal como el departamento es.
reviews.response:

Mariana y Roberto

reviews.comments: mariana muy amable , el departamento es tal cual las fotos.

Desde que contactamos con Mariana tuvimos la mejor onda y el mejor dialogo. No tenemos queja tanto yo como mi novia de lo bien que la pasamos y de lo hermoso que es el departamento. Gracias por todo Mariana y Roberto.

Estuvimos hospedados por mas de dos meses en el apartamento me Mariana y Roberto y fue una estadía muy agradable. Mariana es una anfitriona muy amable, querida y con mucha calidez humana. Siempre estuvo pendiente y en las ocasiones que requerimos algo y nos ayudo inmediatamente. El apartamento esta ubicado cerca al centro de la ciudad cerca a supermercados, cafés, droguería etc. Esta equipado con todo lo necesario como para sentirse uno en casa y  tiene una hermosa terraza que permite disfrutar del aire libre. Definitivamente si tenemos la posibilidad de regresar a Mar del Plata será nuevamente nuestra primera opción de hospedaje. Muchas gracias Mariana y Roberto

El loft es precioso, tal como se ve en las fotos. Pudimos disfrutar mucho el sol en la terraza. Los anfitriones, impecables. Muy puntuales tanto para la llegada como para la salida. Además, estuvieron disponibles y respondieron rápidamente cuando los necesitamos.
reviews.response:
Gracias Cintia por tu comentario :) 
Nos encanto conocerlos . Que se repita !!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 37 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great, clean apartment. Roberto and Mariana were great hosts and we loved our stay. A great place for a couple especially.
Adoramos nossos anfitriões, extremamente prestativos e sempre a disposição do que precisamos.
Very welcoming and helpful. Had a great stay.

The communication run very well, Mariana and Roberto are very flexible. The apartment is just GREAT, well located, and very close from an amazing restaurant, advised by Mariana! We completely recommend this place.

Adorei o apartamento.Muito fiel às fotos do site.Os proprietários estavam viajando mas deram muita assistência através de email,mensagens e (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN).Fui recebida por Luciana,a irmã,com uma garrafa de vinho de boas vindas.

Mariana and Roberto are amazing hosts. Before meeting Mariana, we exchanged several e-mails and it was obvious that they really wanted to ensure that our stay at their apartment in Mar del Plata was perfect. When we arrived Mariana showed us the apartment we had reserved and it was great, just like the photos and very clean. Mariana then offered to upgrade us to the loft/terrace. It was amazing! Large private terrace fully equipped with wooden furniture; just perfect for relaxing in the sun. The apartment was a large mono-ambient, impeccably clean, modern furniture, just perfect. The bed was very comfortable, we slept great every night. There were too many details to mention/remember but included mate and yerba, herbal teas, biscuits, lots of candles, a very comprehensive and useful house manual, soap, etc etc etc Mariana was so welcoming, she really wants to ensure that your stay is perfect. The location was perfect for us, the building is very secure. I know this sounds like a bad cliche but the apartment really felt like a home away from home. Thank you so very much Mariana and Roberto, muchísimos gracias, abrazos y besos. We plan in returning to Mar del Plata and hope that on our return we can stay here again. We fully recommend this apartment to anyone who want a great apartment in Mar del Plata.

Mariana & Roberto apartment was great, modern, stylish and well equipped and good for us three guys, Mariana was very kind and helpful, the location was great, 5 minutes taxi from the shopping mall, sea, train and bus station.

Best stay in Argentina, highly recommend to stay here

Mariana was a great host, and always responded promptly and quickly to any questions we had. She was helpful with the few hiccups with had along the way.

The place itself is pretty good, but as we stayed for 1.5 months it started to feel a bit tight. I think for shorter stays it should be no problem.

By Argentine standards, the apartment is pretty great – great bathroom, good kitchen, and very comfortable bed. Since Mar Del Plata has mostly Argentine tourists, you won't find many AirBNB offerings, much less at this level. 

However, do keep in mind that Mar Del Plata is a beach town (relatively small) compared to Buenos Aires, so it's more relaxed, and, thus, expectations for hotels and rentals tend to be a bit lower compared to larger, more cosmopolitan cities. If you're coming to enjoy the beach, you should really enjoy this place.

If you are sensitive to noise while sleeping, make sure to bring some earplugs – it may take you a bit to get used to the street noise.

We enjoyed getting to know the neighborhood – there is a nice lady with a convenience store across the street (Andrea), a couple of bakeries 2-3 blocks away, washer and drier... And the supermarkets are only 5-6 block away (definitely within walking distance). The Los Gallegos shopping center is also about 7 blocks away.

From all the research I had done at the time, this is probably the best host + apartment in Mar Del Plata.

Thanks Mariana!

We had a great time in Mar del Plata and Mariana and Roberto's apartment. Even though it was late, Mariana and Roberto greeted us at the apartment with a bottle of wine and took their time to answer any questions about Mardel and the apartment. The apartment is located in a less touristy area in the middle of a local neighborhood, about a 10-15 minutes drive to the beach. It's easy enough to get a taxi so it's not really a problem. The building reminds me of something you would see in South Beach. Although its in the middle of the city, the windows that wrap around the apartment and the really lovely private terrace (with plenty of lounging furniture and a great view) make the place feel very beachy. There was a little noise in the morning, but nothing too bad. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. Also, though there is no air conditioning, you really don't need it as even in the summer the nights are cool and the wind is strong.
Mariana was easy to work with and answered all of our questions throughout the weekend. The accommodations were fantastic, and probably the best part of coming to Mar del Plata!
Many thanks to Marianna and Roberto for excellent reception and fine apartments! Everything was perfectly and very good advice on rest in the city!
reviews.response: Thanks it was a pleasure to have known.

reviews.comments:
Mariana and her husband have been incredible! They were very flexible with the time to check-in and out. The apartments, this one and the one on 6th floor, were impeccable. The pix you see on the web make real justice to how the apartments actually are. They are modern and very comfy. They are well equipped for a summer or winter stay. Mariana was really helpful about restaurants. We did try most of her suggestions, and she was absolutely right!
I can't thank them enough for making our stay such a wonderful one! We'll definitely be back!

Thank you!
Sofia
